title: Ep. 1  Adam Buxton
itunes:title: Ep. 1  Adam Buxton
itunes:subtitle: Cariad talks to comedian, writer and podcaster Adam Buxton
description:
Cariad talks to comedian, writer and podcaster Adam Buxton (Adam & Joe Show, BUG, Son of Rambo) about the recent death of his father. As ever they discuss grief, the awkwardness of social care and how it's never like the films.


You can tweet the show @thegriefcast, follow us on instagram @thegriefcast or email us thegriefcast@gmail.com because you are not alone.

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/griefcast.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
